alert.note: Alert for Baraga (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 19 at 12:27AM EDT until July 19 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM EDT FOR SOUTHERN BARAGA COUNTY... At 1226 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near L`anse, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Baraga, L`anse, Covington, Alberta, Three Lakes, U.S. 141 between Covington and Amasa, Canyon Falls, Craig Lake State Park, Herman, King Lake, Watton and Ned Lake. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and deadly cloud to ground lightning. Seek shelter inside a well-built structure. Stay away from windows.
